quests.title: Whispers of the Ancient Grove
quests.description: Elder Malik has asked you to investigate the strange whispers coming from the Ancient Grove. Collect Moonlight Flowers that can help recharge the sacred grove relic.

objectives.description: Speak with Elder Malik about the Ancient Grove
Collect 5 Moonlight Flowers from the Ancient Grove
Return to Elder Malik with the Moonlight Flowers

quests.title: Secrets of the Crystal Cave
quests.description: Deep within the mountains lies a crystal cave filled with ancient power. The cave has been overrun by corrupted guardians. Clear the cave and collect crystal shards to help the village mage craft a powerful artifact.

objectives.description: Find the entrance to the Crystal Cave
